channel.title: [webclient]Need help with [quantum 639] weird error
channel.description:
so i have jarred and signed the client and it works with my vps ip and then i used a webclient.html file like this
[code]<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>FrozenHeart</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="armageddon" width="765" height="503" archive="armageddon v1.jar" code="RunClient.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML>[/code] when i run it on my pc it works and loads up the webclient
then i went to 000.webhhost.com and uploaded the webclient.html along with my armageddon v1.jar in the same folder then i ran it and it loads up the java thing then it says error incompatabile magic value 17172632 in class file Runclient i have tried a different client and jarred it and everything and it still dosent work and gives the same error and im really confused now please can somebody explain what is happening
Thanks
p.s the website is http://www.armageddonv2.net84.net/webclient.html

item.title: [webclient]Need help with [quantum 639] weird error

item.description:

Thanks
